Getting TPTP installed in Ubuntu - first post from Ivar

07 Feb 2008

One of the Codehoopers started to blog about Eclipse and programming, welcome aboard! :) As he doesn't have much readers yet I guess it's ok to point to his first post: Eclipse TPTP and Ubuntu" It's about getting TPTP running. Especially under Linux. Don't underestimate the complexity of this - it's not that easy :) Nice post, thank you! PS. Some old-time readers might remember that Ivar has been featured at this blog also before - Four is the Magical Number - and so is 5920.
